biography.bio: Petra Redinger was born on June 26, 1949 in Düsseldorf, Germany. She is an actress, known for Bambule (1970), Freundschaft mit Herz (1995) and Der Tod der Schneevögel (1974).
biography.name: Petra Redinger

biography.bio: Christine Diersch was born on January 3, 1943 in Zeulenroda-Triebes, Germany. She is an actress, known for Bambule (1970), Hofball bei Zille - Musikalisches Spiel im Berliner 'Milljöh' (1972) and Heinrich IV. (1967).
biography.name: Christine Diersch

biography.bio: Dagmar Biener was born and raised in Berlin. At the age of three she appeared in the movie 'Stips' as daughter of Gustav Fröhlich. Joining children's ballet at the Friedrichstadtpalast she began a substantial ballet training at early age. Her later drama school teacher was Else Bongers in Berlin. Dagmar made her debut on stage in 1968 at the Renaissance-Theater, Berlin. Ever since she is regularly present on a variety of Berlin stages. Since 1969 Dagmar Biener has participated in many TV and movie productions. One of her first projects was the film adaptation of the Ulrike Meinhof's play 'Bambule', directed by Eberhard von Itzenplitz. Later she appeared in Loriot successful movies 'Ödipussi' and 'Pappa Ante Portas'. In 1999 she shot 'Club der Millionäre' with Thorsten Näter and appeared as Erna Goltz in Nathalie Steinbart's movie 'Endstation Tanke' in the year 2000. After being featured in Dominik Graf's 'Hotte im Paradies' she now frequently performs in TV series like 'Soko Leipzig', 'Soko Wismar' and 'Sabine' .
biography.name: Dagmar Biener

biography.bio: Helge Hennig is an actor, known for Bambule (1970) and Frau von Bebenburg (1975).
biography.name: Helge Hennig

biography.bio: Barbara Schöne was born on May 19, 1947 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Too Hard to Handle (2016), Baltic Storm (2003) and Vier wie wir (1997).
biography.name: Barbara Schöne

biography.bio: Antje Hagen was born on August 10, 1938 in Pethau, Germany. She is known for her work on Le Tourbillon de l'amour (2005), Das Fräulein (1967) and Alle Jahre wieder: Die Familie Semmeling (1976). She was previously married to Günter Jendrich.
biography.name: Antje Hagen

biography.bio: Marlene Riphahn was born on December 5, 1922 in Cologne, Germany. She was an actress, known for In einem Monat, in einem Jahr (1969), Die Party (1963) and Ein kleines Fest (1968). She died on October 26, 2004 in Bergisch Gladbach, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Marlene Riphahn

biography.bio: Dagmar Tass is an actress, known for Bambule (1970), Unternehmer (1970) and Frauensiedlung (1976).
biography.name: Dagmar Tass

biography.bio: Christiane Lemm was born in 1952. She is an actress, known for Relations (2010), In the Shadow of Power (2003) and Die Hitlerkantate (2005).
biography.name: Christiane Lemm

biography.bio: Petra Schröder is an actress, known for Der Partyphotograph (1968), Guess Who's Sleeping with Us Tonight? (1969) and Scheibenschießen (1970).
biography.name: Petra Schröder

biography.bio: Hansi Jochmann was born on February 19, 1953 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Le labyrinthe du silence (2014), Pfarrer Braun (2003) and Shining Through (1992). She has been married to Prof Dr Reinhold Gruen since December 27, 1985. They have two children. She was previously married to Ulrich Gressieker.
biography.name: Hansi Jochmann

biography.bio: Ute Gerhard is an actress, known for Ein Fall aus lauter Liebe (1968), A Woman in Flames (1983) and Die lieben Kinder (1970).
biography.name: Ute Gerhard

biography.bio: Hilde Hessmann is an actress, known for Die Rückkehr (1969), Federlesen - Bilder aus dem Leben eines Einfallsreichen (1972) and Kein Pardon (1993).
biography.name: Hilde Hessmann

biography.bio: Sabine Koerner is an actress, known for Wenn der junge Wein blüht (1967), Bambule (1970) and Alma Mater (1969).
biography.name: Sabine Koerner

biography.bio: Monika Häckermann was born on July 4, 1950 in Görlitz, German Democratic Republic as Monika Söhnel. She is an actress, known for Rosenstrasse (2003), Solo für Schwarz - Tod im See (2005) and Der blonde Affe (1999). She was previously married to Hans Häckermann.
biography.name: Monika Häckermann
